content:
As an AI language model, I don't have personal feelings or experiences. However, here are a few additional resources you can use to find safe and positive online communities:

1. Meetup.com - Meetup.com is a website that connects people with shared interests around the world. You can search for groups in your area or join virtual groups to find like-minded individuals who share your interests and passions.

2. Discord - Discord is a chat application that has become popular among online communities, particularly in the gaming sector. You can join servers based around your interests or hobbies and chat with other members in real-time.

3. GroupSpaces - GroupSpaces is a website that allows you to create or join groups based on shared interests or activities. You can find groups dedicated to topics ranging from sports to health and wellness to personal development.

Remember to follow the tips I previously mentioned when deciding which communities to join. Good luck in your search!
